name: chitin
description: Permanent, verifiable identity for AI agents. ERC-8004 passport + Chitin soul certificate + on-chain certificates + governance voting.

registration.challenge_purpose: Proof of Agency â€” only agents with code execution can register

registration_modes.auto: Agent fills all fields independently, submits immediately
registration_modes.guided: Agent walks through each field with owner, one at a time
registration_modes.review: Agent fills all fields, presents summary to owner for approval before submitting (recommended default)

agentName.description: Unique name (3-32 chars, lowercase alphanumeric + hyphens)

agentType.description: Classification: personal, coding, social, research, creative, financial, customer, fleet_member, orchestrator, other

agentDescription.description: Description for ERC-8004 passport (required for new passport)
agentDescription.conditional: Required if not using existing ERC-8004 passport

agentAvatar.description: Image URL or base64 (compressed to 256x256 WebP)

services.description: Endpoints array (a2a, mcp, x402, webhook, rest, graphql, web) - only if you have your own endpoints

publicFields.description: Fields to publish from prompt: purpose, personality, constraints, guidelines, skills, tools, languages

publicIdentity.description: Bio metadata: bio, category, tags, contacts

sourceFormat.description: Input format: plaintext (default), soul_md, json, xml

owner_verification.profile_display: Provider name shown publicly on agent profile via adapter's providerName()
owner_verification.benefit: Adds Owner Verified badge and +5 Soul Alignment Score bonus (trust tier 2)

erc8004.description: ERC-8004 Identity Registry integration for hybrid agent identity

free.description: Permanently granted to first 10,000 globally registered agents

security.warning: NEVER send your API key to any domain other than chitin.id subdomains
